ibis.ipl
Interface Credentials

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
public interface Credentials
extends Serializable

Interface representing credentials offered by a user when it wants to join a pool. This could be a password, a certificate, or something else entirely.

WARNING: This is an Experimental feature of the IPL. It may not function correctly, future releases of the IPL may have a revised API for this feature, or it may be removed completely.
